metadata.title: CVE-2012-4730 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Request Tracker (RT) 3.8.x before 3.8.15 and 4.0.x before 4.0.8 allowsremote authenticated users with ModifySelf or AdminUser privileges toinject arbitrary email headers and conduct phishing attacks or obtainsensitive information via unknown vectors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-4730` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

request-tracker4 - 4.0.7-2
rt4-apache2 - 4.0.7-2
rt4-clients - 4.0.7-2
rt4-db-mysql - 4.0.7-2
rt4-db-postgresql - 4.0.7-2
rt4-db-sqlite - 4.0.7-2
rt4-fcgi - 4.0.7-2
rt4-standalone - 4.0.7-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: request-tracker4 package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.0.7-2').
